Text.val: 08.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
... set again toolbar buttons, changed in ODC005

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CRSD_NO, CRSD_CRST_NO, CRSD_DATE, DEBC_NO, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_DEBH, DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DEBH_HADR_CITY, DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY, CRSD_DEBTORADVICE, CRSD_CLIENTADVICE, CRSD_INTERNALADVICE, CRSD_DEBTORACTION, CRSD_CLIENTACTION, CRSD_INTERNALACTION from :1/CRSD join :1/CRST on CRST_ADMNO = :2 and CRST_CLNTNO = :3 :4 and :5 left outer join :1/DEBC on DEBC_NO = CRSD_DEBC_NO left outer join :1/DEBH on DEBH_NO = DEBC_DEBH where CRSD_CRST_NO = CRST_NO order by CRSD_DEBC_NO, CRSD_DATE for fetch only

select CRSD_NO, CRSD_CRST_NO, CRSD_DATE, DEBC_NO, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_DEBH, DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DEBH_HADR_CITY, DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY, CRSD_DEBTORADVICE, CRSD_CLIENTADVICE, CRSD_INTERNALADVICE, CRSD_DEBTORACTION, CRSD_CLIENTACTION, CRSD_INTERNALACTION from :1/CRSD join :1/CRST on CRST_ADMNO = :2 and CRST_CLNTNO = :3 :4 and :5 left outer join :1/DEBC on DEBC_NO = CRSD_DEBC_NO left outer join :1/DEBH on DEBH_NO = DEBC_DEBH where CRSD_CRST_NO = CRST_NO order by CRSD_DEBC_NO, CRSD_DATE for fetch only

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Date')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor number client')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor number ING Comfin')&';'&MlsTrans ('Name debtor')&';'&MlsTrans ('City debtor')&';'&MlsTrans ('Country')&';'&MlsTrans ('Advice debtor')&';'&MlsTrans ('Advice client')&';'&MlsTrans ('Advice internal')
Trim ({0,16})&';'&MlsTrans ('Final action debtor')&';'&MlsTrans ('Final action client')&';'&MlsTrans ('Final action internal')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CRSD_NO, CRSD_CRST_NO, CRSD_DATE, DEBC_NO, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_DEBH, DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DEBH_HADR_CITY, DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY, CRSD_DEBTORADVICE, CRSD_CLIENTADVICE, CRSD_INTERNALADVICE, CRSD_DEBTORACTION, CRSD_CLIENTACTION, CRSD_INTERNALACTION from :1/CRSD join :1/CRST on CRST_ADMNO = :2 and CRST_CLNTNO = :3 :4 and :5 left outer join :1/DEBC on DEBC_NO = CRSD_DEBC_NO left outer join :1/DEBH on DEBH_NO = DEBC_DEBH where CRSD_CRST_NO = CRST_NO order by CRSD_DEBC_NO, CRSD_DATE for fetch only
